page.title: 02FOLLY GATE
page.content: {FOLLY GATE}is a small village with a population of about 230 and about 100 houses.There is a main road running through the middle of{FOLLY {GATE}which gets very crowded in the summer holidays as it is the Holiday Route. There is a pub on the crossroads owned by Mr.& Mrs. Brettell.It is called the {Crossways}Inn.In the olden days people used to travel from Hatherleigh to Okehampton and stop at the Crossways Inn to rest. There is a small hall looked after by Mrs Orchard. Events are held there like parties and dances.There are two shops one in the garage and the other in the Post Office. There are three firms a tractor firm, a garage that sells cars and a building firm.There is a{chapel}but you have to go to Inwardleigh to go to church.
